Today in Northwest Wales, it's a no-go with fresh 28 mph SSE winds creating a blown-out scene across the coast, and the swell is 3 ft @ 5s SSW. Tomorrow brings a slight improvement with 5 ft @ 8s WSW swell and lighter 16 mph SSW winds, making it workable at spots like Porth Oer and Hells Mouth.
